title: TINY TRACTOR TINY FARM: JOHN DEERE 1025R IS KILLIN' IT!

tasks.task: Tilling a garden with a box blade on a tractor.
subtasks: Pitching the box blade by shortening the top link.
Lowering the ripper teeth as far as possible.
Attaching 70-pound weights to the box blade.
Using the heavy hitch tooth bar.
Using a box blade and brush crusher to cut down shrubs.

tasks.task: Moving dirt and sand from a berm behind the barn.
subtasks: Using a stump bucket to remove timbers.

tasks.task: Consideration of potential hazards during the projects.
subtasks: Watching out for honey bees.
Transporting a full bodysuit for protection against honey bees.

tasks.task: Considering future projects on the farm.
subtasks: Potentially renting a chainsaw.
Preparing a garden plot using a box blade.
Considering the limitations of small tractors with light weight.
Preparing the garden beds for planting.

tasks.task: Resolving payment issues with the landowner.
subtasks: Discussing a honey payment instead of cash.
